properties.name: Above the Falls
properties.description: Riverfront Open Space Framework for the East Bank of the Upper Mississippi River.The Minneapolis Riverfront Corporation that guides riverfront revitalization in Minneapolis, asked the Metropolitan Design Center to help them begin a discussion about al arger vision for the river. The MDC assisted in developing an urban design frameworks strategy for the East ban of the river above st. Anthony Falls.PI: Ignacio San Martin, MDCDirect Participants: Scale: 2
